name: Capsule Subsystem Holostorage EH-CN-J44-004
description: Although battered and scorched by the destruction of the capsule it was installed in, this subsystem holostorage device seems to retain some recoverable and relatively easily decrypted data: "–ade a new connect with a Serpentis subcontractor operating in 4-4 undercroft sector 97. I hate going down there. It's worse than the docks district. Worse even than the engineering subcore residences. It's pretty much a sump for everything filthy and completely messed up on this damned station. Had to wear a pseudoface and combat rig, of course. Serp guy was packing a bloody nanowire pistol. Don't really blam–"
